name: tm14
effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.
